thread.title: Here’s Why Ekta Kapoor Has Banned Media From The Sets Of Her Show
thread.title_full: Here’s Why Ekta Kapoor Has Banned Media From The Sets Of Her Show

author: Sukriti Gumber
title: Here’s Why Ekta Kapoor Has Banned Media From The Sets Of Her Show
text:
Sukriti Gumber Feb . 21 . 2017 Ekta Kapoor 
Ekta Kapoor has been the television czarina for almost two decades now – and irrespective of your TV shows’ preferences, you can’t deny that she has a very strong presence. She has single-handedly ruled our TV screens and living rooms – and that’s no mean feat. 
Currently, Ekta has a bunch of ongoing shows, such as Ye Hai Mohabbatein , Naagin , Pardes Mein Hai Mera Dil and Kumkum Bhagya etc. No wonder then every once in a while, Balaji’s head honcho has to take drastic measures to maintain her numero uno position. Although all her shows are a hit with the audience, the ratings are getting affected due to the footage of the show being leaked online. Therefore, Ekta has reportedly banned media from entering the sets of her show to avoid such issues in the future. 
Oh well, the lady sure knows how to keep a suspense. 2
